information: The company ADOLF PETIG GMBH. & CO.KG., is a Manufacturer/ Producer, founded in 1934, which operates in the Gardening and horticulture - equipment and supplies industry. It also operates in the Floristry - equipment and supplies industries. It is based in Wuppertal, Germany.
